quotes.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: You can’t go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: You define your own life. Don’t let other people write your script.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

quotes.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.author: Jim Ryun

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
quotes.author: Rob Siltanen

quotes.quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Wishing is not enough; we must do.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Imagine your life is perfect in every respect; what would it look like?
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right – for you’ll be criticized anyway.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.quote: When you have a dream, you’ve got to grab it and never let go.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.quote: I can’t change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Life is what we make it, always has been, always will be.
quotes.author: Grandma Moses

quotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
quotes.author: André Gide

quotes.quote: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Not everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. It's about creating yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Life is ten percent what happens to us and ninety percent how we respond to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: An unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Do not go gentle into that good night. Rage, rage against the dying of the light.
quotes.author: Dylan Thomas

quotes.quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting. Overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
quotes.author: Joshua J. Marine

quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: I would rather die on my feet than live on my knees.
quotes.author: Emiliano Zapata

quotes.quote: A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Life isn’t about waiting for the storm to pass, it’s about learning how to dance in the rain.
quotes.author: Vivian Greene

quotes.quote: Do what you love and the money will follow.
quotes.author: Marsha Sinetar

quotes.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.quote: You are enough just as you are.
quotes.author: Meghan Markle

quotes.quote: We do not remember days, we remember moments.
quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

quotes.quote: Life is really about creating balance.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
quotes.author: Jerry Dunn

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Raise your words, not your voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Be like a tree and let the dead leaves drop.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: A man who views the world the same at fifty as he did at twenty has wasted thirty years of his life.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Service to others is the rent you pay for your room here on earth.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Don’t be afraid your life will end; be afraid that it will never begin.
quotes.author: Grace Hansen

quotes.quote: Don’t fear failure. Fear being in the exact same place next year as you are today.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Being productive is about maintaining a balance between doing and being.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: The best preparation for good work tomorrow is to do good work today.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Don’t confuse activity with productivity. Many people are simply busy being busy.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Your success will be determined by your own confidence and fortitude.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: Stop overthinking; it will only steal your joy.
quotes.author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib (RA)

quotes.quote: You cannot solve a problem by overthinking it; sometimes you need to step back and breathe.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: You don’t have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: Keep your eyes on the stars and your feet on the ground.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Henry Stanley Haskins

quotes.quote: Limit your 'always' and your 'nevers.'
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.quote: Begin anywhere.
quotes.author: John Cage

quotes.quote: No one is perfect - that’s why pencils have erasers.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Riebe

quotes.quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.

quotes.quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone else’s cloud.

quotes.quote: Some people look for a beautiful place. Others make a place beautiful.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: We generate fears while we sit. We overcome them by action.

quotes.quote: When you are enthusiastic about what you do, you feel this positive energy. It’s very simple.

quotes.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh

quotes.quote: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.

quotes.quote: A champion is defined not by their wins but by how they can recover when they fall.
quotes.author: Serena Williams

quotes.quote: If my mind can conceive it, if my heart can believe it, then I can achieve it.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: You can, you should, and if you’re brave enough to start, you will.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.

quotes.quote: The best way out is always through.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear—not absence of fear.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right—for you’ll be criticized anyway.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow’s reality.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Stay close to anything that makes you glad you are alive.

quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: You must do the things you think you cannot do.

quotes.quote: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you’re the pilot.

quotes.quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.

quotes.quote: Do not watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

quotes.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

quotes.quote: To be the best, you must be able to handle the worst.

quotes.quote: Light tomorrow with today.

quotes.quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.

quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.

quotes.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.

quotes.quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.

quotes.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.

quotes.quote: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.

quotes.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.

quotes.quote: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.

quotes.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.

quotes.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.quote: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Do not be embarrassed by your failures. Learn from them and start again.

quotes.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.

quotes.quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.

quotes.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.

quotes.quote: Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.

quotes.quote: Opportunities don’t happen. You create them.

quotes.quote: Don’t let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.

quotes.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.

quotes.quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

quotes.quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.

quotes.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.

quotes.quote: The best revenge is massive success.

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.

quotes.quote: Do what you love and success will follow. Passion is the fuel behind a successful career.
quotes.author: Meg Whitman

quotes.quote: Chase the vision, not the money; the money will end up following you.

quotes.quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.

quotes.quote: Dream big. Start small. Act now.

quotes.quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.

quotes.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.

quotes.quote: Go the extra mile. It’s never crowded there.

quotes.quote: Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.

quotes.quote: Success is not the absence of failure; it’s the persistence through failure.

quotes.quote: Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.

quotes.quote: Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.

quotes.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Your limitation—it’s only your imagination.

quotes.quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.

quotes.quote: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.

quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

quotes.quote: Don’t let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.

quotes.quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.

quotes.quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.

quotes.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.

quotes.quote: It’s not the load that breaks you down, it’s the way you carry it.

quotes.quote: Be so good they can’t ignore you.

quotes.quote: The secret to success is to know something nobody else knows.

quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second-best time is now.

quotes.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Opportunities multiply as they are seized.

quotes.quote: Success is a journey, not a destination.

quotes.quote: Courage is one step ahead of fear.

quotes.quote: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.

quotes.quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it is done.

quotes.quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.

quotes.quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Hard times may have held you down, but they will not last forever.

quotes.quote: Don’t judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.

quotes.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.

quotes.quote: To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Motivation gets you going, but discipline keeps you growing.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: Success is not measured by what you accomplish, but by the opposition you have encountered.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
quotes.author: Karen Lamb

quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: The road to success is always under construction.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: Never confuse a single defeat with a final defeat.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Worrying is like a rocking chair; it gives you something to do but gets you nowhere.
quotes.author: Glenn Turner

quotes.quote: Overthinking is a misuse of the imagination.
quotes.author: Dan Zadra

quotes.quote: Confidence is silent. Insecurities are loud.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Worrying does not take away tomorrow’s troubles, it takes away today’s peace.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Relax, take a deep breath, and remember everything happens for a reason.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You can’t always control what goes on outside, but you can always control what goes on inside.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Do not let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Failure is not the opposite of success; it’s part of success.
quotes.author: Arianna Huffington

quotes.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Your heart is the size of an ocean. Go find yourself in its hidden depths.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Thinking is the capital, Enterprise is the way, Hard Work is the solution.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: If You Can'T Make It Good, At Least Make It Look Good.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: It is bad for a young man to sin; but it is worse for an old man to sin.
quotes.author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quotes.quote: If You Are Out To Describe The Truth, Leave Elegance To The Tailor.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Wear gratitude like a cloak and it will feed every corner of your life.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Everyone has been made for some particular work, and the desire for that work has been put in every heart.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The Way To Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Speak any language, Turkish, Greek, Persian, Arabic, but always speak with love.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Happiness comes towards those which believe in him.
quotes.author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quotes.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If you want to feel rich, just count the things you have that money can’t buy.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Never regret a day in your life. Good days give happiness, bad days give experience.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: When you come out of the storm, you won’t be the same person who walked in. That’s what the storm is all about.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: You are what you do, not what you say you’ll do.
quotes.author: Carl Gustav Jung
